name: Flavor Drainer
description:
Have you ever bitten into a burrito, and been surprised to discover that someone else had removed all of the beans and cheese from the inside? Well, now you can give someone the joy of that experience. Virtually, anyway.

Find the 3 buckets scattered across the map. Click on a food item to cut a hole in it, and the contents of the food (if any is left) will start pouring out. Collect the food-juice with buckets. When a bucket is full, place it in the white teleportation pod ( labeled with an arrow). If it is full, it will be beamed to your spaceship. Otherwise, nothing will happen, and you will need to fill it more.

Can you fill all three buckets and beam them to your ship?

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD to move. Hold Spacebar to fly.

Left click a bowl to pick it up. Left click on the location you want to put it down on to place it. 

Left click a food to stab a hole in it. Left click it again to seal the hole.

Right click and move the mouse to rotate the camera.

Mouse over a food item to see how much content is left in it.

Notes

You will hear a "slushing" sound while a not-yet-filled bucket is being filled with foodjuice. Use this to help judge when a bucket is full, and whether the game is registering the bucket as "making contact" with foodjuice.
